name: Vue
desc: Vue Js is a powerfull, light and handy web framework for web app development. I've started with Vue 3 and Js and now i'm on Vue 3 combined with Typescript using Option API.

name: TypeScript
desc: Basically Javascript with Types. It has a strong static types for data that provides higher security and maintenance code which made me prefer it over Javascript.

name: JavsScript
desc: One of the most popular coding language for web development. An Object Oriented Programing language which happens to be the first language in my very first web project.

name: Sass/Scss
desc: A popular preprocessor of CSS that provides possibilities not included in CSS like functions, variable, etc... It can be very usefull for big project.

name: Html 5
desc: Hypertext Markup Language, One of the basics of web development. HTML in its fith version is a markup language for web.

name: Css 3
desc: HTML5 's binomial. CSS or Cascading Style Sheet is a styling language that pairs to HTML to get stunning result in your website.

name: Express Js
desc: Express Js is a minimalistic NodeJs backend framework written in Javascript. It is used to build application based on NodeJs like a web server.

name: Node Js
desc: Node Js is a development environment that allows the execution of Javascript on the server side. That is why it is mostly used to create web servers.

name: Less
desc: Less is another CSS preprocessor like Scss/Sass. It provides the same possibilities but with few differences like no loop. I did learn it during my intership in 2023.

name: MongoDB
desc: MongoDb is a Database Management System (DBMS) for non-relational document database. It has flexible data model that unable unstructured data storage. That also can be confusing.

name: MySQL
desc: MySQL, opposite to MongoDb is a DBMS for relational databases. The database structure is organized into physical files optimised for speed.

name: Adobe Photoshop
desc: Photoshop is a software from the Adobe suite. It is a professional and powerful software for image treatment. That involves photo manipulation, web design, graphism, etc...

name: Adobe Illustrator
desc: Illustrator, like photoshop is a software from the Adobe suite but unlike it, Illustrator is dedicated to graphic design and vector shapes. It allows graphic creations in vector like file like pdf or svg.

name: Clip Studio Paint
desc: Clip Studio Paint is a dedicades drawing software tool which is one of the most complete and powerfull of its type. I moved to it due to those reasons.

name: MedibangPaint Pro
desc: MedibangPaint Pro is another dedicades drawing software. It is less complete than CSP but it is free and powerfull enough to get you some amazing result and it was my first drawing software.
